output: Trumpin suitsuttamat puhelut sekä Meksikon presidentin että partiolaisjärjestön johtajan kanssa ovat osoittautuneet keksityiksi.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
Sarah Huckabee Sanders, the White House press secretary, confirmed that neither one of the calls took place.
output: Valkoisen talon tiedottaja Sarah Huckabee Sanders vahvisti, että puheluita ei ollut tapahtunut.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
However, she said that Trump did not lie.
output: Hän kuitenkin sanoi, ettei Trump valehdellut.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
According to Sanders, many leaders of the Boy Scouts talked with Trump in person, and Trump had a conversation with Enrique Peña Nieto, the President of Mexico, at the G20 summit in Hamburg.
output: Sandersin mukaan monet partiolaisten johtohahmoista puhuivat Trumpille henkilökohtaisesti, ja Meksikon presidentin Enrique Pena Nieton kanssa Trump oli keskustellut Hampurin G20-kokouksessa.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
"I wouldn't say it was a lie – that's a pretty bold accusation.
output: En sanoisi, että se oli valhe, se on aika kova syytös.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
The conversations took place, they just simply didn't take place over a phone call, they happened in person", Sanders said.
output: Nuo keskustelut tapahtuivat, ne eivät vain tapahtuneet puhelimessa vaan kasvotusten, Sanders perusteli.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
Speech to Boy Scouts raised criticism
output: Puhe partiolaisille herätti paheksuntaa

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
On Monday, Trump told that the President of Mexico called him and congratulated Trump for his success in reducing illegal immigration.
output: Trump kertoi maanantaina Meksikon presidentin soittaneen hänelle ja kehuneen Trumpin onnistuneen laittoman siirtolaisuuden kitkemisessä.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
According to Trump, Peña Nieto said that not many cross the southern border because they know that they will be stopped at the US borderline.
output: Trumpin mukaan Pena Nieto kertoi, että harva tulee enää Meksikon etelärajan yli, koska he tietävät matkan joka tapauksessa tyssäävän Yhdysvaltain rajalle.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
On Wednesday, the Mexican Government issued a statement, saying that this phone call never took place.
output: Meksikon hallitus julkaisi keskiviikkona tiedotteen, jossa se sanoi, ettei kyseistä puhelua ole tapahtunut.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
On Tuesday, Politico published a full version of Trump's interview with the Wall Street Journal
output: Tiistaina Politico julkaisi täydellisen version Trumpin haastattelusta The Wall Street Journalin kanssa.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
where Trump praised his speech at the National Scout Jamboree in West Virginia.
output: Siinä Trump hehkutti puhettaan kansallisen partiolaisjärjestön suuressa kokouksessa Länsi-Virginiassa.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
"I got a call from the leader of Boy Scouts who said that it was the best speech that was ever made to them,
output: Sain puhelun partiopoikien johtajalta, hän sanoi, että se oli hienoin puhe, joka heille on koskaan pidetty.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
and they were very thankful", Trump said.
output: He olivat hyvin kiitollisia, Trump kertoi.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
On Wednesday, the Boy Scouts of America announced that they do not have any information about any of their leaders placing a call to Trump.
output: Keskiviikkona partiolaisjärjestö tiedotti, ettei se ole tietoinen kenenkään johtohenkilönsä puhelusta Trumpille.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
According to the announcement, the previous statement of Michael Surbaugh, the Chief Scout Executive, in which he apologised to all members of the organisation for Trump's speech speaks for itself.
output: Tiedotteen mukaan järjestön johtajan Michael Surbaughin aiempi lausunto, jossa hän oli pyytänyt Trumpin puhetta anteeksi partiolaisilta, puhuu itsensä puolensa.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
Trump's speech at the National Scout Jamboree aroused astonishment, as it was unusually political considering the nature of the event.
output: Trumpin puhe partiolaisjärjestön kokouksessa herätti paljon kummastusta, sillä se oli tapahtuman luonteeseen nähden poikkeuksellisen poliittinen.

instruction:
Translate the following text from English to Finnish:
For example, he praised the results of last autumn's presidential election.
output: Hän muun muassa hehkutti viime syksyn presidentinvaalien tuloksia.
